name: Spellgrimage
description:
"At the origin of humanity, there were great towers, whose size reached the clouds.
Created by the Gods, they brought comfort and peace to the hearts of men.
Legend said that if a man could reach the top floor of one of these towers, he would gain infinite knowledge.
Out of curiosity and despair, many tried, but all perished, leaving behind sorrows and regrets.
Tired of these failures, Men decided, by pure anger, to destroy these vestiges of the Gods, leaving no trace for future civilizations."

Spellgrimage is a tactical RPG rogue lite, with gestion part. Choose your heroes, assign them skills, and set out to conquer an adventure full of mystery and danger.

Features

  • Rogue-Lite game : each new run is unique!
  • Play with many heros with unic gameplay and skills
  • Real synergy system between heroes depending on your preferences
  • Many side quests and secret passages to discover
  • Beautiful Pixel Art and animations made by professionals artist
  • Optional Card game with solid gameplay
